body_html: With custom getter you can implement it only if you replace all variables in that scope, there is no way to use a custom getter and also allow for get variables. Is it at least possible if the custom getter returns None to fall back to the other code?
body_text: With custom getter you can implement it only if you replace all variables in that scope, there is no way to use a custom getter and also allow for get variables. Is it at least possible if the custom getter returns None to fall back to the other code?
body: With custom getter you can implement it only if you replace all variables in that scope, there is no way to use a custom getter and also allow for get variables. Is it at least possible if the custom getter returns None to fall back to the other code?
